question: Comet Halley orbits the sun every 50 years. Bob's dad saw the Comet when he was 33 years old. Bob saw the comet a second time when he was three times the age his dad was when he saw the Comet. How old was Bob when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
Bob saw the Comet for the second time when he was 33 years * 3= <<33*3=99>>99 years old.
Comet Halley can be seen every 50 years, so Bob saw the comet for the first time when he was 99 years - 50 years = <<99-50=49>>49 years old.
#### 49
